commit a genetic fallacy in the following passage? Why or why not? Can
the origin of a moral belief ever show that that moral belief is false or
unjustified or indefensible? Why or why not?
Let us articulate this new demand: we need a critique of moral values, the value of
these values themselves must first be called into question—and for that there is
